title: [BUG] libmicrohttpd is still listed in External-Dependency-Info.txt file
body: ### Description With PR [3463](https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/pull/3463), SkiaSharp team removed the “**_libmicrohttpd_**” dependency from Skia, as it was previously used only by the **skiaserve** tool. However, it still appears in the [External-Dependency-Info.txt](https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/blob/release/3.119.3-preview.1/External-Dependency-Info.txt#L1475) of latest preview release (3.119.3-preview.1). Could you please remove this entry if it was added by mistake? Otherwise, kindly let us know the reason for still keeping it listed under [External-Dependency-Info.txt](https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/blob/release/3.119.3-preview.1/External-Dependency-Info.txt#L1475). ### Code Old Dependency List -> https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/blob/release/3.119.3-preview.1/External-Dependency-Info.txt#L1475 ### Expected Behavior **libmicrohttpd** must be removed from the [External-Dependency-Info.txt](https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/blob/release/3.119.3-preview.1/External-Dependency-Info.txt#L1475) file as it's removed recently. ### Actual Behavior It's removed from the Skia repo but still added in [External-Dependency-Info.txt](https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/blob/release/3.119.3-preview.1/External-Dependency-Info.txt#L1475) file ### Version of SkiaSharp 3.116.0 (Current) ### Last Known Good Version of SkiaSharp 2.88.9 (Previous) ### IDE / Editor Visual Studio (Windows) ### Platform / Operating System All ### Platform / Operating System Version _No response_ ### Devices _No response_ ### Relevant Screenshots ### Relevant Log Output ```shell ``` ### Code of Conduct - [x] I agree to follow this project's Code of Conduct
